column3: News;Sihanoukville:------Â Two electricians were killed and another was seriously injured after work on a pylon went wrong.------The incident took place at 2:50 pm on December 20
column5: in front of the Shihhou Building
column7: Preah Sihanouk province.------Officials said that the electrical supply had not been disconnected
column8: although it was supposed to have been.------ The three men are believed to have been working for a private contracting company who were hired to connect a nearby building to the main grid.------It is still unclear who will be held responsible for the deaths.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/397503
